title: Greek moussaka
ingredients: ['3 aubergines, peeled and cut lengthways into 1cm thick slices', '1 pinch salt', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '450g lean minced beef', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon fines herbs', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '225g passata', '125ml red wine', '1 egg, beaten', '120g freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'For the bechamel', '950ml milk', '110g butter', '6 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt to taste', 'ground white pepper, to taste']
